name: Fragment of Arcane Power
description: Used to level up Wizard class Reyvateils. It represents the dedicated study and mastery of magical knowledge, reflecting the Wizard's ability to manipulate arcane forces through learned spells and rituals.

name: Fragment of Faith
description: Used to level up Cleric class Reyvateils. It represents the unwavering belief and devotion that fuel their divine magic.

name: Fragment of Focus
description: Used to level up Monk class Reyvateils. It represents the mental discipline, inner peace, and focused energy that empowers their martial arts.

name: Fragment of Mana
description: Used to level up Sorcerer class Reyvateils. It represents raw magical energy, symbolizing the Sorcerer's innate ability to manipulate arcane forces.

name: Fragment of Melody
description: Used to level up Bard class Reyvateils. It symbolizes the harmonious melodies and rhythms that empower their performances.

name: Fragment of Rage
description: Used to level up Barbarian class Reyvateils. This component represents the raw, untamed energy that fuels their rage.

name: Fragment of Justice
description: Used to level up Paladin class Reyvateils. It embodies the righteous ideals, unwavering conviction, and devotion to justice that empower their divine abilities.

name: Fragment of Precision
description: Used to level up Ranger class Reyvateils. It represents the keen senses, precise aim, and deep connection to nature that empower their skills.

name: Fragment of Steel
description: Used to level up Fighter class Reyvateils. This component embodies the strength, discipline, and resilience required for martial combat.

name: Fragment of Stealth
description: Used to level up Rogue class Reyvateils. This component embodies the cunning, agility, and mastery of shadows that allow them to move unseen and strike with deadly precision.

name: Shard of Arcana
description: A refined form of magical energy, reflecting the Sorcerer's growing mastery and control over their innate magical abilities.

name: Shard of Darkness
description: A manifestation of the Warlock's deepening bond with their patron, granting them greater access to their patron's power and influence.

name: Shard of Divinity
description: A concentrated form of divine energy, reflecting the Cleric's growing connection to their deity.

name: Shard of Focus (Ranger)
description: Represents a heightened awareness and mastery of their chosen fighting style and favored terrain.

name: Shard of Fury
description: A more potent version of the Fragment of Rage, required for higher-level Barbarians.

name: Shard of Harmony
description: A refined version of the Fragment of Melody, representing a deeper understanding of musical harmony and its magical properties.

name: Shard of Mysticism
description: A culmination of years of study and magical practice, representing the Wizard's deep understanding of arcane principles and their ability to weave potent spells.

name: Shard of Shadow
description: Represents a deeper understanding of stealth and deception, allowing the Rogue to manipulate shadows and blend seamlessly into their surroundings.

name: Shard of Tranquility
description: A manifestation of inner harmony and perfect balance, signifying the Monk's mastery of their physical and spiritual energies.

name: Shard of Valor (Fighter)
description: A symbol of courage and unwavering determination, reflecting the Fighter's mastery of combat skills.

name: Shard of Valor (Paladin)
description: A symbol of courage and selflessness, reflecting the Paladin's unwavering commitment to protecting the innocent and upholding their oaths.

name: Fragment of Stealth
description: Used to level up Rogue class Reyvateils. This component embodies the cunning, agility, and mastery of shadows that allow them to move unseen and strike with deadly precision.

name: Ember Fragment
description: Used to level up Blood Hunter class Reyvateils. It embodies the volatile energy drawn from their own life force and the manipulation of blood magic.

name: Infernal Shard
description: A crystallized fragment of infernal energy, reflecting the Blood Hunter's dangerous pact and their growing mastery over dark and potent forces.
